com.krupizde.persistence

Class DaoMedium

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.krupizde.persistence.DaoMedium

  • public class DaoMedium
extends java.lang.Object
    Dao class for working with mediums and medium_types in database. Uses singleton,
    Author:
    Zdeněk Krupička (radamanak@gmail.com)

    • Method Detail

      • getDao

        public static DaoMedium getDao()
        A singleton methos for returning instance of this class.
        Returns:
        Only one instance of DaoMedium

      • addMedium

        public boolean addMedium(Medium medium)
        Method tries to add medium to database. If it fails (unique name constraint is triggered) medium already exists in database.
        Parameters:
        medium - Medium to add
        Returns:
        True if success, false otherwise

      • addMediumType

        public int addMediumType(Suffix suff)
                  throws java.sql.SQLException
        Method checks if given medium type is already in database. If so, its id is returned. New medium type is inserted otherwise and its id is returned.
        Parameters:
        suff - Suffix of the medium type to insert/get id of
        Returns:
        Id of medium type
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • typeId

        private int typeId(Suffix suff)
            throws java.sql.SQLException
        Method tries to get id of given medium type
        Parameters:
        suff - Suffix of which to return id
        Returns:
        Id of medium type if exists, -1 otherwise
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • existsMediumByName

        public boolean existsMediumByName(java.lang.String name)
                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        Method checks if medium with given name already exists in the database.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the medium to check
        Returns:
        True if it exists, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • setDownTime

        public void setDownTime(Medium m)
        Method sets download time to given medium (now)
        Parameters:
        m - Medium to which set the download time

      • getNotDownloadedMediums

        public java.util.ArrayList<Medium> getNotDownloadedMediums(int limit)
                                                    throws java.sql.SQLException
        Method returns limit number of mediums from database that have not set download time (were not downoaded yet).
        Parameters:
        limit - Limit of returned mediums
        Returns:
        List of loaded mediums
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
